table.name: location_load_unload_point
table.description: Represents an actual load/unload point as it relates to a location along with data that is associated with that relationship.

columns.name: LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Location at which the load/unload point resides.

columns.name: LOAD_UNLOAD_POINT
columns.description: Load/unload point such as a loading dock.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: Equipment group profile for the load/unload point; overrides any at the location.

columns.name: IS_LOAD
columns.description: Indicates if this dock or point make be used for loading.

columns.name: LOAD_SEQUENCE
columns.description: Indicates where dock should be in a load sequence.

columns.name: IS_UNLOAD
columns.description: Indicates if this dock or point make be used for loading.

columns.name: UNLOAD_SEQUENCE
columns.description: Indicates where dock should be in an unload sequence.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
